input_text:
Job Title: Growth Marketing Manager

Location: San Francisco Bay Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Job Description

Litera, headquartered in Chicago, IL, is a fast-growing software company and one of the leading legal technology suppliers in the world. Serving more than 90% of the world's largest law firms, hundreds of thousands of lawyers use our software every day. As a company recognized as one of the best places to work, we believe professional development, rewards programs, open communication, and transparent leadership contribute to a unique and open work environment. Our employees are driven, energetic, passionate, and have the ability to make a direct impact on the future of the company.

The Opportunity: This individual will report to the Sr. Director, Growth Marketing, and will be a crucial member of Litera's growth marketing team and help integrate the company's value propositions into the buyer's journey. You will have strategic, programmatic, and tactical/operational responsibilities related to demand creation program objectives. This role will be responsible for executing marketing campaigns that generate MQLs, SQLs, and marketing influenced pipeline to scale customer revenue growth efforts to support global sales targets.

You will work closely with our Revenue, Go-to-Market, Product Marketing, Field Marketing, Marketing Operations, and Digital Demand centers. You are eager to expand Litera's brand awareness, educate and capture buyers' interest, and ultimately build a marketing influenced pipeline to exceed revenue targets. You have experience navigating a matrix-driven organization and are hands-on with executing marketing programs execution and ABM. Preferably, you understand working in legal practice, LegalTech, FinTech, Enterprise Software, or SaaS companies to effectively share personal experience and be passionate about solving real-world problems that lawyers face every day.

A Day in the Life:

Partner with the product marketing and content teams to design and execute demand generation programs to create compelling demand gen content and offerings mapped to buyer personas, pain points, and buying cyclesWorth closely with Revenue Leaders to develop and support whitespace and product focused ABM programs plans to help the Revenue organizatopn drive incremental pipeline and bookingsForecast, analyze, and evaluate the effectiveness of all demand generation and awareness activities; report on program activities, including cost per lead, cost per response, trends, conversion to opportunity rates, contribution to sales pipeline, ROI, etc.For all programs, work with content marketing to initiate landing page creation, email copy, and automated workflows to support the execution of digital programsManage and execute global virtual events, webinars, multi-touch emails, 3rd party sponsorships, etc.Work closely with Business Development Representative (BDR) team and Customer Success Managers (CSMA) to improve MEL, MQL, and SQL conversion rates and lead handling processes

Key Requirements

Proven Marketing Experience: The ideal candidate should have a strong background in executing comprehensive marketing programs, with particular strengths in online advertising and outreach initiatives. Experience in managing webinars and driving product launches is essential.Execution Capabilities: We are looking for someone who can effectively implement marketing strategies and activities - including marketing campaigns and product launches. The ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely and successful execution, is crucial.Email and Webinar Marketing Proficiency: The candidate should be skilled in either email marketing or webinar management, with a strong grasp of how to use these tools to generate leads and build brand awareness.Familiarity with Key Tools: Proficiency in leading marketing automation and CRM tools such as Marketo, HubSpot, and Eloqua is required. Experience with project management software like Asana is also beneficial.Industry Knowledge: Experience in technology marketing, especially within B2B SaaS or legal tech sectors, is a plusTeam Collaboration and Leadership: Ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic team environment, leading marketing initiatives and coordinating with other departments to achieve business goals. The capacity to inspire and guide team members is valued.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Growth Marketing Manager
output_json.summary: A fast-growing software company seeks a Growth Marketing Manager to integrate value propositions into the buyer's journey and execute marketing campaigns.
job_responsibilities: Partner with product marketing and content teams to design and execute demand generation programs.
Work closely with Revenue Leaders to develop and support whitespace and product-focused ABM programs.
Forecast, analyze, and evaluate the effectiveness of demand generation and awareness activities.
Manage and execute global virtual events, webinars, multi-touch emails, third-party sponsorships.
Improve MEL, MQL, and SQL conversion rates and lead handling processes.
output_json.company_information: Litera, a fast-growing software company recognized as one of the best places to work, offers a unique and open work environment with driven, energetic, and passionate employees.
